forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High -6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low -7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 24F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 0C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later at night. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 3C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light snow in the evening will give way to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow in the evening will give way to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional snow showers later during the night. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then some snow showers later at night. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 27F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some rain and snow throughout the day. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow for the afternoon hours. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
